product_name: Weed Warrior Weed & Grass Killer Concentrate Refill
description:
Kill unwanted vegetation with less waste

Refill your Weed Warrior starter system for continuous weed & grass control.

This concentrated herbicidal soap formula is designed for your existing Sunday pouch and wand sprayer. Our fast-acting, non-selective concentrate kills stubborn populations of weeds, mosses, algae, and grasses quickly - with visible results in as little as 20 minutes. Perfect for use in garden beds, near patios, along sidewalks, in mulched areas, and other yards areas where complete vegetation control is needed.

sections.product_features:
Organic herbicidal soap concentrate refill
Kills all vegetation including weeds and grasses
OMRI-listed for organic gardening
See results in as little as 20 minutes
Non-staining formula
Non-selective - use carefully around desired plants
For use with Weed Warrior starter kits
sections.whats_included: 27 oz. bottle of herbicidal soap concentrate. Designed as a refill for your existing Sunday Weed Warrior starter kits.
sections.instructions:
For best results, apply between 50-85 degrees F when no rain is expected for 3+ hours:
Pour one full bottle of Weed Warrior into your reusable Sunday pouch and attach the sprayer
Use your outside hose to fill the pouch up to the 1-gallon mark
Secure the cap of the reusable pouch and shake well
Spray onto unwanted vegetation until leaves are entirely covered
Repeat treatment in 2-3 weeks for best results
sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Lawn Advisors:
How does weed and grass killer work?
Weed Warrior is a powerful herbicidal soap made from fatty acids. It eats away at the waxy coating that protects most green leafy growth from the elements, causing rapid desiccation and plant death.
What vegetation does Weed Warrior control?
Effective against bluegrass, chickweed, crabgrass, corn spurry, dandelion, groundsel, lambsquarters, mouse-eared chickweed, mustards, plantain, redroot pigweed, round leaved mallow, sheep sorrel, shepherd's-purse, stinkweed, thistle, moss, algae, and lichens.
Do I need the Weed Warrior Starter Pack to use this product?
Yes, this is a refill concentrate only. You'll need the sprayer and pouch that come with the Weed Warrior Starter Pack or Starter 2-Pack to apply this product.
Can I use weed and grass killer on my lawn?
Weed Warrior is non-selective, meaning it will kill any vegetation it contacts - including grass. We recommend using it in gardens, sidewalks, mulch and other hardscapes rather than within your lawn. If you use Weed Warrior within your lawn, repair it with Sunday Grass Seed or Bare Repair (https://www.getsunday.com/shop/category/lawn-care/grass-seed).
How long does concentrate last?
Concentrates have a shelf life of approximately 2 years. After the initial mixing, mix well again if it sits for 30+ days.
Are there any US states where this is not approved for use?
This product is approved for use in all states.
